ROM.Changelog:
# Camera Patch Link <HttpUrl><![CDATA[https://www.androidfilehost.com/?fid=745425885120755014
# AIMROM September Update : -Merge September security patch -Final Nougat Released -Add support for Snapdragon LLVM toolchain (SDClang) -Add support for boost framework -Add support for fling velocities -Added Colorengine -Added Xosp Blur personalization -Added AOKP Transition animations -Added New battery style -Enable/Disable kill button on notification guts -Fix string derps -Fix In-Call vibrations -Animate icon while locking a task -Fix Lockscreen shortcut icons disappearing after reboot -Make button long press delay configurable in SmartBar -Fix layout of system header -Fix task lock and free form button placement -Fix Dex2oat -Fix In-Call timer bug -Fixed a npe -Fix theme issues in screen pinning mode -Disable home button wake on devices with sensitive HW buttons -Add check for accidental touch -Add pocket lock and pocket judge -Doze Service: Fallback to tilt sensor as pickup sensor for ambient display -Fix many memory leaks -Option to block sensor for certain packages -Fix few NPEs -Increase sensitive numbers support -Update all translations -Update all pre-built packages -Performance enhancements and bug fixes
# aio_row Specific Changelog - Build 15 August - Now Official - Fixed Hotspot - wifi-tethering: ap0 fully functional, no more stuck on obtaining ip-address - usb-tethering: set to rndis0 only - doze: gesture support added - sepolicy: updated magisk permissions - ramdisk: cleaned up & removed some unusual mounts - overlay: removed unused IMS overlays & switched defaultNotificationLEDcolour to lime. - Youtube 720p60 lag fixed - Default spectrum profile updated to 1495 MHz (stock frequency) - Reverted few Video encoders to stock.
- Build 15 June - Inital Build ---
# Note :
_Clean flash is recommended. Bug reports are not appreciated without Logcat. Builds will be available soon when maintainers will get free time. So don't ask for ETAs._
---
]]>
